title: Battle of the Beats
itunes:title: Battle of the Beats
description:
Alex does double duty this week with Gran Turismo 7 and WWE 2K22, our weekly progress checks with Elden Ring and Horizon continue, the Xbox leaves a tiny footprint in Japan, we watch that Obi-Wan trailer, an intra-apartment sonic battle looms, and more!

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

(00:00:00) NOTE: Some timecodes may be inaccurate in versions other than the ad-free Patreon version due to dynamic ad insertions. Please use caution if skipping around to avo
id spoilers. Thanks for listening.
(00:00:10) Intro
(00:02:05) The Obi-WAN and other fun network names
(00:09:06) That Obi-Wan teaser
(00:14:43) The Video Games
(00:15:02) Gran Turismo 7 [PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5] on Mar 04, 2022
(00:25:49) First Break
(00:25:54) WWE 2K22 [PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5] on Mar 11, 2022
(00:38:33) Elden Ring [PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5] on Feb 25, 2022
(00:42:21) [POSSIBLE MINOR ELDEN RING SPOILER]
(00:44:46) [END OF POSSIBLE SPOILER]
(00:48:47) Horizon Forbidden West [PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4] on Feb 18, 2022
(00:59:33) Second Break
(00:59:37) News
(01:00:04) Elden Ring is a big earner
(01:07:34) GTA V is priced to move on next-gen consoles
(01:12:45) Stalker 2 is on hold due to war
(01:15:13) Advance Wars 1+2 Re-Boot Camp delayed
(01:17:11) Forspoken delayed until October
(01:19:11) God of War is coming to TV
(01:24:37) Xbox sales figures from Japan
(01:32:48) Wrapping up and thanks
(01:33:54) Mysterious Benefactor Shoutouts
(01:35:45) Quick reminder about podcast timecodes
(01:37:39) Nextlander content updates

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
